docs.title: py-auto-docs
docs.text:
Example module for automatically documenting a python module using mkdocs and mkdocstrings.

Check out the source files here: https://github.com/yaleman/py-auto-docs/

Check out the generated docs here.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
An example class

Source code in example/__init__.py 
class Example():
""" An example class """

    def __init__(self, username:str, password:str):
""" Stores the data. """

        self.username = username
        self.password = password

    def login(self):
""" Logs in to the system. """
        pass

docs.text:
Stores the data.

def __init__(self, username:str, password:str):
""" Stores the data. """

    self.username = username
    self.password = password
